text: Sredi lyudey yest' takiye, kotoryye priravnivayut k Allakhu [idolov] i lyubyat ikh tak zhe, kak lyubyat Allakha. No Allakha sil'neye lyubyat te, kto uveroval. O, yesli by nechestivtsy mogli znat' - a oni eto uznayut, kogda ikh postignet nakazaniye v Sudnyy den', - chto mogushchestvo prinadlezhit tol'ko Allakhu, chto Allakh surov v nakazanii
